name: FanSoundsbyBedtimeFan
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: bedtime fan
des:
Bedtime Fan helps ADULTS sleep by:
- Blocking out unwanted noises
- Forming a sleep association that cues you to fall asleep
- Helping you feel calm, relaxed, and soothed.

Bedtime Fan helps BABIES sleep by:
- Forming a sleep association that cues your baby to fall asleep
- Engaging your baby’s calming reflex allowing baby to sleep longer
- Blocking outside noises that may wake your baby
- Creating a familiar routine that will help baby feel safe even in new surroundings.

Free users can play the fan uninterrupted for up to four (4) hours.
Go beyond standard fan noise with a Premium subscription:
- Enjoy continuous, uninterrupted play for as long as you need.
- Gently fade out the fan when it’s time to wake up, instead of abruptly shutting off.
- Schedule the fan to fade out after playing for a certain duration, or at a specific time.

Don't forget, you can always add Bedtime Fan to a nightly bedtime routine to make it even easier to regularly get to sleep! To add this skill to a daily timer, follow these steps:
- Open your Alexa App.
- Select Routines.
- Select Schedule, add a time (say 9:00 PM).
- Choose Skills / Your Skills.
- Choose ‘Fan Sounds by Bedtime Fan'. You're done!
